pli-tv-kd19:1.3.31: Tatrime bhūtā—timitimiṅgalo → timirapiṅgalo (bj); timitimiṅgalo mahātimiṅgalo (sya-all, km)
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.63: Na ca, bhikkhave → na ca bhikkhave bhikkhunā (sya-all, km)
pli-tv-kd19:3.2.1: pātimokkhaṭṭhapanaṃ → idaṃ padaṃ bj, sya-all potthakesu
pli-tv-kd19:3.5.16: sikkhaṃ paccakkhātakathā → sikkhāpaccakkhātakathā (bj); sikkhaṃ paccakkhātakakathā (@an10.32#1 [32. Pātimokkhaṭṭhapanāsutta])
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.37: na sampāyati → na sampādessati (cck); na sampādeti (sya1ed, sya2ed); na sampādayati (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd19:5.7.62: Soyeva tassa akkhāti → añño cāro cayenaṃ; suddhā ca tassa akkhāti (bj); añño cārocayāti taṃ; suddhe va tassa akkhāti (sya-all); vipassañño cārocati; taṃ suddheva tassa akkhāti (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
